summary: Green Day is an American rock band formed in 1987 in California. The band, made up of Billie Joe Armstrong, Mike Dirnt, and Tr√© Cool, became famous with their album "Dookie" in 1994. They are known for popularizing punk rock in the U.S. along with other California bands. Green Day has released many successful albums, including "American Idiot," which was also made into a Broadway musical. They've won five Grammy Awards and have sold over 75 million records worldwide. The band was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2015.
title: Green Day
